channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole quickly getting worse, 27th February
item.description:
Yet another pot hole which is quickly getting worse. There are so many pot holes along this whole top section of Manor Lane. Please could someone come to do a site visit to assess ALL of the potholes and consider a full resurfacing. Currently a team is sent to address only the potholes which are specifically reported and those get white paint around them and numerous other potholes are ignored.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 large potholes impossible to avoid, 27th February
item.description:
There are 2 large and deep potholes in the lane outside Woods Cottage. Due to the narrow lane it is impossible to avoid driving along the lane without bumping down into the potholes. Please could they be repaired urgently as they are damaging all vehicles who need to use the lane. This is the only route in and out for all residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge potholes narrowing lane significantly, 27th February
item.description:
Emergency barriers were put in place to flag these huge potholes but no emergency repairs have been done! Please could these be fixed as a matter of urgency. The lane is in urgent need of repair.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manor Lane, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yellow Lines no longer visible, 27th February
item.description:
The yellow parking restriction lines are no longer visible on this section of Church Road. Commercial vehicles and cars consistently park here and it is particularly dangerous in the mornings when children are walking to the nearby school.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Church Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Badly degraded road and pavement outside number 14, 27th February
item.description:
Directly outside number 14 Branch Hill Rise. Both the road and pavement are badly degraded and potentially dangerous to pedestrians, cyclists and motorists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Branch Hill Rise, Cheltenham
